404.PAGE_DESC: Nothing was found here, that's all we know.

500.PAGE_DESC: Server made an oopsy, but we can't show you why. Let our staff know instead!

dashboard.WIDGET_BILLING_CYCLE_DESCRIPTION: When your next bill is processed on

index.INTRODUCTION_DESCRIPTION: Multi-purpose cloud based artificial intelligence & machine learning service for all
index.INTRODUCTION_IMAGE_ALT: CoffeeHouse's Lydia being used in Python
index.FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: CoffeeHouse is a one stop solution for cloud-based artificial intelligence & machine learning processing, overtime more features are added and improved on CoffeeHouse
index.FEATURE_1_DESCRIPTION: We also have a great community where you can drop by in and ask any question your heart desires
index.FEATURE_2_DESCRIPTION: Our open source API Wrappers & Documentation is available to all, free free to contribute!
index.FEATURE_3_DESCRIPTION: We provide the service for free if you would like to use it for personal uses, need more? it's also affordable with monthly subscriptions!
index.FEATURE_4_DESCRIPTION: CoffeeHouse is not dependent upon third party services or libraries such as Tensorflow to function, everything was build from scratch.
index.FEATURE_5_DESCRIPTION: We are constantly working hard to add and improve this service for everyone
index.FEATURE_6_DESCRIPTION: No need for complicated configurations or setups, start using our services with little to no effort as a software developer
index.PRICING_DESCRIPTION: Choose the right plan for your necessities
index.CALLBACK_100: There was an unexpected error while trying to process your request
index.CALLBACK_101: Intellivoid Accounts returned a response that was not understood by the server
index.CALLBACK_102: There was an error while trying to process your authentication: %s
index.CALLBACK_103: Intellivoid Accounts cannot be reached at this time
index.CALLBACK_104: The authentication method that was used isn't supported by this server
index.CALLBACK_106: The subscription plan was not found
index.CALLBACK_107: The subscription plan is not available

lydia_demo.HEADER_DESCRIPTION: Lydia is a advanced chat bot that actively learns from conversations and is capable of speaking in many languages without having to hard-configure anything about it.
lydia_demo.AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED_RESPONSE: As much as i would love to chat with you, i need you to authenticate first! this is to prevent abuse and spam
lydia_demo.GENERIC_ERROR_RESPONSE: Uh oh... Something went wrong, try refreshing maybe?
lydia_demo.SESSION_ERROR_RESPONSE: Whoops! There seems to be an issue with our chat session. Try refreshing this page!
lydia_demo.SESSION_EXPIRED_RESPONSE: Hey! our chat session expired, we can talk again though! Try refreshing this page!
lydia_demo.INTRODUCTION_MESSAGE: Hello! Try having a conversation with me!

purchase.DETAILS_DESC: Review subscription details and start the subscription
purchase.DETAILS_PAYMENT: You will pay $%cp USD every %bc days
purchase.PROMOTION_DESC: If you have a promotion code to receive a special offer, you can enter it below and verify it
purchase.CALLBACK_101: The promotion code is not available
purchase.CALLBACK_103: The promotion code is not applicable to this plan

service_error.HEADER_DESCRIPTION: There was an error while trying to handle your request
service_error.DESCRIPTION_1: There was an error while trying to handle your request, please send this page's URL to Intellivoid Support
service_error.DESCRIPTION_2: Well, it's optional. But the URL contains important information which allows a programmer to determine the issue
service_error.DESCRIPTION_3: Nothing personal of course, just ask the programmer.
